Smooth, reassuring vocals that are delivered with a warm sweetness. Makes vulnerability feel safe and sincere.

title: Touch & Go | artist: Sedona | mood: dreamy, melancholic, nostalgic | activity: walking, late night, reflecting, daydreaming | genre: indie, pop | vibe: hazy, intimate, airy, soft vocals
Floaty production and soft delivery that feels like a soundtrack to a 90s movie. Kind of like reviving a memory you never understood.

title: Sugar | artist: Remi Wolf | mood: uplifting, energetic | activity: cooking, driving, daydreaming, late night | genre: pop | vibe: synthy, rhythmic, chaotic, retro, layered
Playful, punchy, and a little unhinged in a good way. Almost like seeing colors bouncing.

title: Letting Go | artist: Calica | mood: uplifting, nostalgic, energetic | activity: commuting, cooking, relaxing, driving | genre: pop, indie | vibe: synthy, soft vocals, hypnotic, rhythmic, moody
Bright synths and a leading beat that feel full of momentum. Introspective by moving forward while still looking back.

title: 3 AM | artist: HAIM | mood: nostalgic, energetic, uplifting | activity: driving, commuting, late night | genre: pop, rock | vibe: rhythmic, retro, textured, layered, intimate, soft vocals
Late-night restlessness with a beat and sultry vocals that makes you feel cheeky. Deals with unresolved feelings that are still buzzing.

title: Think Too Much | artist: Hannah Jadagu | mood: calm, dreamy, melancholic | activity: studying, walking, reflecting | genre: pop, indie | vibe: minimal, soft vocals, intimate
Soft chants that convey the quiet spiral of overthinking. Gentle ear-candy that soothes, but kinda stings you.

title: One Of The Greats | artist: Florence + The Machine | mood: uplifting, energetic, gritty | activity: working out, driving, venting, late night | genre: rock, alternative | vibe: cinematic, expansive, raw, chaotic, ethereal
Big and unfiltered emotions delivered by Florence's classic hard-hitting dramatics. Makes you twirl endlessly while banging your head like her.

title: Ego Death At A Bachelorette Party | artist: Hayley Williams | mood: frustrated, gritty, melancholic | activity: late night, reflecting, venting, driving | genre: alternative, rock | vibe: dark, raw, textured, intimate
Uncomfortable for some, brutally honest, and confrontational towards how the singer sees the world currently. Makes you face your insecurities as they are.

title: Augustine | artist: Blood Orange | mood: dreamy, nostalgic, melancholic | activity: walking, late night, daydreaming, hazy, commuting | genre: r&b, indie | vibe: hazy, lo-fi, textured, cinematic
Poem-like feel with melodic spoken words. Distant vocals create a surreal, floating atmosphere - signature Dev Hynes. Subtly incorporates Krio (language from Sierra Leone). Kinda makes you feel like you're in a small budget, indie movie.

title: Half Mast | artist: Empire Of The Sun | mood: dreamy, uplifting, nostalgic | activity: driving, daydreaming, walking | genre: electronic, pop | vibe: futuristic, airy, synthy, expansive
Contrasting vocals - from almost nasally spoken to bright head voice create a mist of nostalgia. Feels like artist is trying to plea for someone to come back to their life.

title: My Love | artist: Mariah Carey | mood: warm, nostalgic, calm, dreamy | activity: relaxing, daydreaming, reflecting | genre: pop, r&b, soul | vibe: melodic, soft vocals, intimate, minimal, retro
Classic ballad feel with a heartfelt delivery that makes it feel timeless yet leaning into 'old-love-song' vibe. If you listen closely you can almost find a new instrument every time you hear this song again.

title: In Your Feelings | artist: Mariah Carey | mood: frustrated, gritty, melancholic | activity: venting, driving, reflecting, late night | genre: r&b, pop, soul | vibe: textured, moody, raw, melodic, intimate, soft vocals
Classic Mariah, but now with a mature tone. Tempo change is very pleasing and the instruments highlight every word's meaning. Highlights awareness of a relationship's decline but not necessarily knowing how they got there. Makes you want to move on, while being just a bit reluctant.

title: Catching Bodies | artist: Sekou | mood: gritty, energetic, uplifting | activity: working out, venting, driving, late night | genre: soul, r&b | vibe: dark, rhythmic, raw, chaotic, retro
Sekou knows what he wants and is aware of temptation. Has sort of a retro energy and sharp delivery that hits hard and consistently with each beat. Made to move through anger, not around it.

title: Caesar in a TV Screen - Ides of March Version | artist: The Last Dinner Party | mood: gritty, energetic, frustrated | activity: venting, working out, driving, cooking | genre: alternative, rock, indie | vibe: chaotic, raw, cinematic, expansive, dark, ethereal
Theatrical energy, artists seems comment on a specific male performer persona and how public perceives it. Song deal with insecurities and hypothetics. Sound builds as tempo picks up and the artist's voice fills the room.

title: Throw Down | artist: Fleetwood Mac | mood: gritty, energetic, frustrated | activity: driving, venting, late night, reflecting | genre: rock, pop | vibe: textured, rhythmic, raw, retro
Tension builds as soon as you hear Stevie. As Lindsey joins, you feel the resentment as if it was yours. Like a confrontation you’ve been rehearsing in your head.

title: Calling After Me | artist: Wallows | mood: nostalgic, melancholic, dreamy, energetic | activity: walking, late night, reflecting, daydreaming, commuting | genre: pop, indie | vibe: hazy, textured, melodic, synthy, distorted vocals
Longing weirdly well matched with uptempo beat - jangly guitars and synth sound makes it fresh. Expresses the excitement of the initial 'chase' between two people.

title: Fire & Lightning | artist: Fulton Lee, Karen Linette | mood: dreamy, melancholic, warm, gritty | activity: relaxing, reflecting, daydreaming, venting | genre: r&b, indie, soul | vibe: intimate, acoustic, ethereal, melodic, hypnotic
Stripped-back production that feels emotional and powerful. Their voices is like liquid fire, hitting ear-candy high notes and sparking some static as some rasp appears to shock you.

title: No One's Watching Me | artist: Ezra Collective, Olivia Dean | mood: warm, uplifting, calm | activity: late night, relaxing, daydreaming, reflecting, venting | genre: jazz, soul, r&b | vibe: warm, rhythmic, intimate, melodic, layered
Loose, cheeky collaboration that feels unguarded and connected with someone. Sax and Olivia's voice make you feel the comfort of being yourself when no one’s looking.

title: Let Me Love You | artist: Amber Mark | mood: warm, melancholic, dreamy, uplifting | activity: late night, reflecting, relaxing, walking | genre: r&b, soul | vibe: soft vocals, intimate, airy, melodic, raw, ethereal
Velvety vocals that have an earthy edge by Amber. Great for strutting when having somewhere to go. Calm convitcion of connection with someone.

title: The Scythe | artist: The Last Dinner Party | mood: gritty, dark, frustrated, nostalgic, melancholic | activity: venting, late night, reflecting, driving, crying | genre: alternative, rock, indie | vibe: chaotic, cinematic, raw, dark, ethereal
Heavy and dramatic storytelling that feels mythical and personal. Anger and vulnerability clash while almost time-travelling to your last days and talking with loved ones for the last time.

title: Glum | artist: Hayley Williams | mood: melancholic, frustrated, gritty | activity: reflecting, venting, late night, driving | genre: rock, alternative | vibe: raw, intimate, minimal, dark, distorted voice
High-pitched Hayley, amlost child-like, acts as your intrusive thoughts while normal Hayley gives you hard truths. Makes you sit with feelings you usually avoid.

title: Parachute | artist: Hayley Williams | mood: dreamy, melancholic, energetic, gritty | activity: late night, relaxing, reflecting | genre: rock, alternative, pop | vibe: ethereal, soft vocals, airy, intimate, raw
Crystal clear vocals that keep you company while free falling and feel all the feels, even before her voice intentionally goes more grungey. Head banging and mouthing 'I thought you were gonna catch me.'

title: who's your boyfriend | artist: Royel Otis | mood: energetic, dreamy, gritty | activity: driving, walking, late night, cooking | genre: indie, alternative, pop | vibe: retro, rhythmic, textured, moody
Bouncy tension with a jealous sub-layer. Sounds playful, but feelings related to something unresolved are brewing.

title: Vampire Bat | artist: Glass Animals | mood: dreamy, gritty, energetic | activity: driving, late night, daydreaming, reflecting | genre: electronic, pop, alternative | vibe: futuristic, layered, textured, chaotic, synthy, distorted vocals, hypnotic

title: say something | artist: Royel Otis | mood: melancholic, dreamy, nostalgic, energetic, frustrated | activity: walking, reflecting, daydreaming, commuting | genre: indie, alternative, pop | vibe: hazy, intimate, soft vocals, acoustic, rhythmic
Muted insecurity and overthinking that becomes in pleading out loud (or is it just in your head?). Like practicing a script to confront someone.

title: undressed | artist: sombr | mood: melancholic, dreamy, warm, frustrated | activity: late night, reflecting, relaxing, venting, driving | genre: indie, pop, rock | vibe: intimate, minimal, soft vocals, moody, cinematic, retro
Bare and vulnerable delivery by an almost echo of a voice - yet it feels exposed. Kinda feels like bad communication led to distance between people in a relationship coming to an end.

title: Nothing Matters | artist: The Last Dinner Party | mood: energetic, uplifting, gritty, melancholic | activity: working out, venting, driving | genre: alternative, rock, indie | vibe: cinematic, chaotic, expansive, raw, ethereal
Firm confidence paired with reckless release - the artist's voice feels famliar even to the unfamiliar ear. Feels like doing what it takes, without caring for the consequences, just to feel free and the guitar, keys, trumpet, and drums fuel this feeling.

title: Midnight Sun | artist: Zara Larsson | mood: uplifting, dreamy, energetic, warm | activity: driving, cooking, daydreaming, working out | genre: pop, electronic | vibe: synthy, airy, expansive, melodic, cinematic, futuristic
Sparkly pop production that feels hopeful and endless. Like chasing light when it’s about to fade, and doing it all over in a loop.

title: Color Esperanza | artist: Diego Torres | mood: uplifting, energetic, warm, nostalgic | activity: driving, commuting, cooking, working out, studying | genre: pop, rock | vibe: melodic, rhythmic, expansive, warm, retro

title: Fame is a Gun | artist: Addison Rae | mood: energetic, uplifting, gritty | activity: driving, working out, late night, venting, walking | genre: pop, electronic | vibe: synthy, rhythmic, futuristic, layered, textured, soft vocals, distorted vocals

title: When I Feel It | artist: Mariah Carey | mood: warm, nostalgic, calm | activity: late night, relaxing, reflecting, daydreaming | genre: r&b, pop, soul | vibe: melodic, soft vocals, intimate, layered, textured, retro

Soft, direct honesty that feels pretty while it hurts. Like you already know something's gonna end, but you’re trying to slow it down.

title: Something Heavy | artist: Sam Fender | mood: melancholic, gritty, energetic | activity: driving, late night, reflecting, venting | genre: rock, indie | vibe: raw, textured, expansive, melodic, cinematic

title: People Watching | artist: Sam Fender | mood: nostalgic, melancholic, energetic | activity: walking, commuting, driving, reflecting | genre: rock, indie | vibe: textured, melodic, raw, expansive, retro

title: Black Hole | artist: Griff | mood: energetic, uplifting, frustrated | activity: driving, commuting, working out, late night, dark | genre: pop, alternative | vibe: synthy, futuristic, rhythmic, layered, textured, raw

title: Fantasy | artist: JADE | mood: energetic, uplifting, warm | activity: driving, working out, cooking, late night | genre: pop, alternative, r&b | vibe: synthy, rhythmic, futuristic, layered, airy

title: Don't Let Me Get Me | artist: P!nk | mood: energetic, gritty, frustrated | activity: working out, venting, driving, commuting | genre: pop, rock | vibe: raw, rhythmic, textured, melodic, retro

title: Don't Smile | artist: Sabrina Carpenter | mood: frustrated, gritty, melancholic, nostalgic | activity: late night, reflecting, venting, walking, crying | genre: pop | vibe: moody, textured, layered, melodic, raw

title: LENTO | artist: Cami | mood: dreamy, melancholic, warm | activity: late night, reflecting, relaxing, daydreaming, venting | genre: pop | vibe: intimate, soft vocals, melodic, airy, minimal
